data.title: terayon TJ715 and comcast - Comcast XFINITY
data.meta_description: Forum discussion: How long has comcast been using the terayon TJ715 modem. And is it just as good or ?? than the Motorola cable modems  capcas
data.text:
jbsharpeii

AMD

join:2001-12-22

Chesterfield, VA

jbsharpeii to capcas5

Member

to capcas5

Well the only thing I miss about my SB4100 is the status page, other then that I love my TJ715X. It boots in under 10secs, seems a bit quicker then my SB4100 as well.

capcas5

join:2001-06-06

Sumner, WA

capcas5

Member

Thanks for the fast response. I was setting up the cable modem for a friend and I had not seen a terayon before. It seems the comast tech did not want to take the time to run the cable to his computer, so they left the gear with the statement that they could not set up new users due to the internet attack that was going on. I ran cable to his computer, connected the modem, register the connection and up and running he was.

capcas
